status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Looks like the problem is that NoClassDefFoundError is not an Exception (it's an Error), so it's not caught in the initialization.
Fixed in master. Please verify and close.
I don't think it is wise to catch Throwable like that, it is not appropriate to catch e.g. OutOfMemoryError. I suggest you catch LinkageError (in addition to Exception) instead.
When do you plan release version 2.6? I want to use it in Apache Struts 2.5 to release a GAE-compilant version
